title: The Reaper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Stalk.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the player you Stalk visits someone who dies the same night, you cut them down with your Scythe.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5341
*A former slave, now a farmhand. The devil hisself gave him that scythe and commanded him to start the harvest.*
